amendment.description: Amendment clarifies prohibition of first class travel under the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 111-570 to prohibit first class travel under this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cuellar amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Cuellar.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cuellar amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
